recommendations.title: High Response Time Detected
recommendations.description: API response times are elevated. Consider implementing caching or optimizing database queries.
actions: Implement Redis caching for frequently accessed data

recommendations.title: Elevated Error Rate
recommendations.description: Error rates are above acceptable thresholds.
actions: Review application logs for error patterns
Add retry mechanisms with exponential backoff

recommendations.title: High Database Latency
recommendations.description: Database queries are taking longer than expected.
actions: Add database indexes for slow queries
Consider read replicas for heavy read workloads
